classes.description:
Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
See [CSS API](#css) below for more details.

component.description:
The component used for the root node.
Either a string to use a DOM element or a component.

dense.description: If `true`, compact vertical padding designed for keyboard and mouse input will be used.

disableGutters.description: If `true`, the left and right padding is removed.

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the root element.
descriptions.gutters: Styles applied to the root element if `disableGutters={false}`.
descriptions.selected: Styles applied to the root element if `selected={true}`.
descriptions.dense: Styles applied to the root element if dense.
